data.text: @DietHeartNews @RockafellowDave Please be open, who killed John F Kennedy?

@RockafellowDave "Conspiracy Theory" was coined by the CIA to make "disgusting" - your words - anyone who doubted that a lone gunman who had not shot a rifle that day [Dallas police nitrate test] killed JFK.
@RobRastapop I am posting this - another side to the story, but apparently you only want ONE NARRATIVE. Not how I work...
@DietHeartNews This is the most disgusting tweet I've read about the Ukraine situation yet. Amazingly, it manages to combine 2 conspiracies into one ugly, atrocious thought.

@DietHeartNews Kunstler is a paranoid conspiracy guy (do read his prior predictions)

It discounts and devalues your opinions to promote his
